resources.string: Unfortunately your device does not support NFC. Please click the button to fill out the form.
Enable the NFC setting and please try it again
Unfortunately you are not online. Please check your connection.
Please check your connection so that the identify-agent can reach out you.
Are you sure you want to cancel?
Oops, seems we got a server error
Your connection ist bad. Please try it again.
Seems there are no data and network
Please read the NFC card again.
To make a video call with the identify-agent,please allow access to the camera and microphone.
Please hold your Phone up to your ID card to read the NFC
NFC card is reading. Please do not move the card.
NFC data could not be read. Please try it again.
NFC data read successfully. You will be conneting to the identify-agent.
Please wait on this screen for our customer representative to call you.
Make sure you have your ID with you and ready.
Please answer to start the video call.
Our identify-agent is there for you right away.
Please check your connection and click the button to connect with our identify-agent
Sms code is missing. Please check it.
Are you sure you want to cancel?
You have reached the maximum number of nfc read errors. Continue with the customer representative.
YOU CAN CONTINUE WITH A POWERFUL SMILE.
you can blink to connect customer services
YOU MUST BLINK TO DETECT VITALITY...
TURN YOUR HEAD TO THE RIGHT AT 45 DEGREES TO DETECT VITALITY.
FINALLY, TURN YOUR HEAD TO THE LEFT AT 45 DEGREES TO DETECT VITALITY.
YOU HAVE COMPLETED THE AUTHENTICATION, THANK YOU...
The steps we will take in the identification process are respectively
Scan the back of your ID.
Bring your ID with your phone and have an NFC scan
Please confirm camera and microphone permissions to continue.
